 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָהַם‎</span>] **verb** ==swallow greedily== (= Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Lex, Ethiopic 25</sup> compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ox, cow***); — only **Hithpa\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְלַהֲמִים‎</span> [[Prov.18.8|Prov 18:8]] i.e. ***bits greedily*** ***swallowed, dainties***, = [[Prov.26.22|Prov 26:22]], simile of tale-bearer's words.
